General.Name: Fujian Wanchen Biotechnology Co. Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Wanchen Biotechnology Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, cultivation, production, and sale of edible fungi in China. It offers enoki, crab-flavored, white jade, seafood mushrooms, etc. Fujian Wanchen Biotechnology Co., Ltd was founded in 2011 and is based in Zhangpu, China.
General.Address: Taiwan Farmer Pioneer Park, Zhangpu, China, 363204

1.Name: Ms. Dong Na  Cai
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO & Sec. of the Board
